title: Review a Major ERP Implementation Project
description: An auditor is reviewing a large, in-progress ERP implementation project to assess its risks.

tasks.description: Review the project charter and budget to understand the project's goals and financial scope.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the stated objectives of the project.

tasks.description: Review the project status reports and steering committee meeting minutes for the last 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies that the project is currently behind schedule and over budget.

tasks.description: Interview the project manager to understand the root causes of the delays and cost overruns.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager attributes the issues to scope creep and inadequate resource planning.
